mapper.insert: insert into ahs_user_history ( user_id, history_type, house_id, is_del, house_picture,house_price,house_unit,house_area,house_street,house_title,house_content ) values ( #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{historyType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{housePicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{housePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,#{houseUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{houseArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{houseStreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{houseContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select id, user_id, history_type, house_id, createtime, is_del,house_picture,house_price,house_unit,house_area,house_street,house_title,house_content, (CASE history_type WHEN 1 THEN (select status from ahs_new_house where id=ahs_user_history.house_id ) WHEN 2 THEN (select flag from ahs_second_house where id=ahs_user_history.house_id) WHEN 3 THEN (select flag from ahs_rent_house where id=ahs_user_history.house_id) WHEN 4 THEN (select flag from ahs_shop where id=ahs_user_history.house_id) WHEN 5 THEN (SELECT flag from ahs_office where id=ahs_user_history.house_id) END) as house_flag from ahs_user_history where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
